title: Brazil
summary: Since its establishment in 1915, Citi Brazil offers a broad range of banking services to corporate, institutional and ultra-high-net-worth clients and is known for its high-quality standards and pioneering attitude in creating financial products and services. Citi has contributed to Brazil's growth by channeling investment into the country's infrastructure and private industries, and also serving as the financial advisor to major companies.
tag-2: Citi is a leading bank for Brazil’s institutional clients for more than 100 years.
